topic.title: Setting Up Mail Forwarding
topic.p: Mail forwarding simply forwards incoming mail to other email addresses.

ol.title: To forward incoming mail:

li.p: In the Mailbox Options menu group, click Mail Forward (expand the menu group to see the links, if necessary).

ol.li: Select Forward email to the following email addresses.

Type the email addresses that you want to receive the forwarded mail.
Note: If you type multiple addresses, separate each one with a comma.
If you want to keep copies of forwarded messages, click Save a copy of the forwarded mail on the server.
Click Save. A message appears informing you that your changes have been saved.
